meanings.definition: A state of being excessively concentrated.
meanings.sent1: The hyperconcentrations of sugar in the soda made it too sweet to drink.
meanings.sent2: The hyperconcentrations of students in the library during finals week made it hard to find a quiet spot.
meanings.sent3: The hyperconcentrations of ants in the picnic basket turned it into a bustling ant city.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperconcentrations of thoughts were like a traffic jam in her mind, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconcentrations of stars in the night sky created a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: The act of concentrating to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: His hyperconcentrations on the crossword puzzle helped him finish it quickly.
meanings.sent2: The hyperconcentrations of the chef on the dish resulted in a perfectly balanced flavor.
meanings.sent3: The hyperconcentrations of the dog on the squirrel were comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperconcentrations on her painting were like a laser beam, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconcentrations of the detective on the clues led to a breakthrough in the case.
